
```{r}
# Load required packages
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

# Sample dataset
data <- data.frame(
  Department = c("HR", "IT", "IT", "HR", "Finance", "Finance", "IT"),
  Employee   = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie", "David", "Eve", "Frank", "Grace"),
  Salary     = c(50000, 60000, 55000, 52000, 70000, 72000, 58000),
  Bonus      = c(5000, 6000, 5500, NA, 7000, 7500, 5800)
)

# View the data
data


```

```{r}
# Summarizing with dplyr
summary_tbl <- data |>
  group_by(Department) |>
  summarise(
    Avg_Salary = mean(Salary, na.rm = TRUE),
    Total_Bonus = sum(Bonus, na.rm = TRUE),
    Employee_Count = n()
  )

summary_tbl


```


```{r}
#  Using tidyr to reshape the summary table
summary_long <- summary_tbl |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(Avg_Salary, Total_Bonus, Employee_Count),
    names_to = "Metric",
    values_to = "Value"
  )

summary_long
```
